creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
medium: Cast iron, wrought iron, copper-coated wrought iron
text: They resemble the models of atoms that influenced design in the 1950s and ’60s, but they preceded the Atomic Age by nearly half a century. Sullivan thought of this central iron design motif on the grilles as “seed germs” bursting from their pods, an image described in his prose poem Inspiration from 1886.
title: Pair of elevator grilles, frieze, and overgrille
